column1: Huh?
Of course. You can't be staying in a home with that much fire damage.
Dead-bolted. Token!  Token, you in there?!
Hi, Jesus. Great to be here.
Yup. Just got in.
Nn-nothing. Nothing really at all.
Any particular prize you're hoping for?
Polynesian diggities. I wish you luck. Here we go. What is the thin flap of skin that runs from the base of the penis to the scrotum?
I'm sorry, but YOU'RE ABSOLUTELY RIGHT.  Heheh, tell them what they've won.
Well, Tom, Mary, you must be very excited.
That's all for now. See you tomorrow on  "Ooo, What The Hell Is That!"
Well, because we have more money, son.

...W-well, because we went to graduate school and therefore have more lucrative jobs than most people in town. For instance, your mother is a chemist for a pharmaceutical company, whereas your friend Eric Cartman's mother is a crack whore. One pays more than the other.
Son, you, you don't know what you're saying.
You... sure you want to do this, son?
Where's the... valet?
Ah, here we go.  Take good care of it, please.  Here's twenty dollars.  Hoh?  They've activated some kind of alien blinding device.
Oh.
Next to the-?!
S-son, can you just hurry it up? I don't think we quite fit n here.
We're with the Make-A-Wish Foundation.
What's your wish, pal?
I know! I bet you wanna meet Madonna, huh?
Wu- what was that?
Uh no not quite yet.
